name: UpdateMonitorConfiguration
description:
Update the configuration of a monitor.

Use this tool to update the settings of an existing monitor. Provide the monitor ID and new configuration details to modify its setup.

parameters.name: monitor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the monitor to update.

parameters.name: monitor_configuration_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the new configuration settings for the monitor.
